doc.title: Twenty Classic Kung Fu's
doc.plot: Compilation of the best fight combat scenes (10 man-to-man, 9 woman-to-man, and 1 woman-to-woman) from Revenge of the Iron Fist Maiden, The (1981) Crane Fighter, The (1978) Strife for Mastery (1982) Za ji wang ming dui (1979) aka Kings of Kung Fu, The (1979) Ninja and the Warriors of Fire (1987) Eighteen Bronze Girls of Shaolin, The (1983) Marvelous Kung Fu, The (1981) Zhui ming qiang (1978) aka Blood of the Dragon (1978) Shaolin Fighters Vs Ninja (1981) Invincible Kung Fu Legs, The (1980) Ninja Showdown, The (1987) Iron Neck Li (198?) Blazing Ninja, The (1973) Martial Hero, The (197?) Mantis Vs the Falcon Claws (1983) Fatal Flying Guillotines, The (1977) Five Pattern Dragon Claws (1979) Angry Fist (1974) Four Shaolin Challengers, The (1977) Bloody Fist, The (1972).
